hero.name: André Filipe de Moraes Goulart
hero.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in web development, specializing in cutting-edge technologies such as NodeJS, React, Vue, and TypeScript

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer
about.description1: With over 10 years of experience in web development, I have dedicated my career to creating innovative digital solutions and modern, responsive interfaces.
about.description2: I specialize in cutting-edge technologies such as NodeJS, React, Vue, and TypeScript. I am passionate about continuous learning and delivering efficient, sustainable solutions that make a tangible impact.
about.description3: My family is my greatest inspiration outside of work, driving me to push my boundaries and strive for excellence in everything I do.

skills.title: Skills
skills.motto: Always looking for new technologies and challenges

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: These are some of my favorite projects. Each represents a unique challenge and a growth opportunity.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, or just having a chat about technology.

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: Certifications and courses that validate my technical expertise and commitment to continuous learning.

skopia.title: Fullstack Specialist Engineer | AWS Architect
skopia.description: I am part of a consultancy, allocated to the client Aviva Incasa Residencial Clube, where I propose ideas and create solutions to improve the reservation website for the company's residential club. Maintenance and support on front and back projects related to the Client.

calindra.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
calindra.description: As part of Calindra, a consultancy firm, I am allocated to a client (Tania Bulhões), where I propose ideas and create solutions to improve their e-commerce website. I collaborate with clients to understand their needs, delivering impactful technical solutions to enhance user experience and streamline site performance.

desygner.title: Senior Frontend Engineer
desygner.description: Developed modern, responsive interfaces using React, Vue, Node.js, TypeScript, Styled-components, Storybook, and Nx. Continuously reviewed and improved code, and developed reusable components. Collaborated with designers and product managers to transform concepts into functional solutions.

stone.title: Staff Software Engineer
stone.description: Developed responsive and modern interfaces using Vue.js, Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS.

mosaico_tech_lead.title: Tech Lead
mosaico_tech_lead.description: Led the user team in developing and enhancing authentication systems, logged-in areas, and login pages. Promoted process and functionality improvements through interdepartmental collaboration. Served as a technical reference for two teams, providing guidance and support to enhance developers' technical proficiency.

mosaico_fullstack.title: Full Stack Engineer
mosaico_fullstack.description: Participated in the reengineering of the marketplace checkout system using Next.js and React. Developed a financial dashboard for store reports, using NodeJS + Express in TypeScript for the API and React for the front end.

b2w_tech_lead.title: Tech Lead / Full Stack Developer Senior
b2w_tech_lead.description: Led technical leadership of three projects, Spacey (CMS for marketing publications) and promotions manager. Worked on the Submarino Project using JAVA, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. Later, joined a team to create a new application using React and NodeJS.

b2w_frontend.title: Front-end Developer Junior
b2w_frontend.description: Worked on the Submarino Project using JAVA, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. Later, joined a team to create a new application using React and NodeJS.

rrd_intern.title: Web Development Intern
rrd_intern.description: Assisted in the development and maintenance of internal web applications using ASP.NET and C#. Gained practical experience in web technologies and collaborated with senior developers to enhance my skills.

projectsList.title: Reservation System - Aviva Incasa
projectsList.description: Development of solutions for residential club reservation system, focusing on UX improvements and performance.

projectsList.title: E-commerce Tania Bulhões
projectsList.description: Optimization and improvements to e-commerce platform, focusing on user experience and site performance.

projectsList.title: Marketplace Checkout System
projectsList.description: Complete reengineering of marketplace checkout system using modern technologies.

projectsList.title: CMS Spacey - B2W Digital
projectsList.description: Content management system for marketing publications and promotions manager.
